title: IXL
description: Adaptive maths and English practice aligned to the Australian Curriculum, Year 5 included.

title: Mathletics
description: Popular Australian maths platform with adaptive quizzes and Live Mathletics competitions.

title: Mathspace
description: Sydney-based adaptive maths learning platform used widely in Australia.

title: Reading Eggs
description: Australian literacy program teaching reading up to age 13, including Year 5.

title: ABC Education
description: Free Australian curriculum-aligned videos, games and interactives across subjects.

title: Behind the News (BTN)
description: Australian current-affairs news for kids aged 10–13, made by ABC.

title: Cool Australia
description: Free units of work and lesson plans aligned to the Australian curriculum.

title: Twinkl Year 5–6
description: Australia-specific curriculum resources for Year 5 and 6 across topics.

title: Teach Starter Year 5
description: Worksheets and activities tailored for Year 5, aligned to Australian curriculum.

title: TES Australia
description: Huge collection of teacher resources aligned to Australian Curriculum.

title: Khan Academy
description: Free lessons and practice across subjects—excellent for supplementing learning.

title: National Geographic Kids
description: Articles, quizzes, videos about animals, geography and science—engaging and educational.

title: Funbrain
description: Educational games and books by grade—great for Year 5 reading and math.

title: Scratch
description: Interactive storytelling and game coding—great for logical and creative thinking.

title: Code.org
description: Free coding lessons including block-based programming suitable for Year 5.

title: ABCya
description: Grade-organized educational games—lots of content appropriate for Year 5.

title: Toy Theater
description: Interactive math, reading, art, and music games—great for cross-curriculum play.

title: Storyline Online
description: Actors read kids’ books out loud with visually engaging illustrations.

title: MathGames.com
description: Grade-based interactive math practice—great for building Year 5 skills.

title: Prodigy Math Game
description: Game-based maths practice adaptable for Australian Year 5 standards.

title: Desmos
description: Interactive graphing calculator—great for visual maths exploration.

title: CommonLit
description: Free reading passages and comprehension questions for upper primary.

title: Science Journal for Kids
description: Simplified scientific articles—excellent for Year 5 science inquiry.

title: The Curiosity Show (YouTube)
description: Classic Australian science series featuring experiments and explanations.
